ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually I got to excelent in all the languages a while back, it wasn t being bored.  It was in the hopes that verant would put in quest that required you
ygData.messageBody:
>>Over the weekend I mastered the last languages I had yet to complete, and
>>now
>>have all of them maxed. :) I love it.
>
>>Shannyn
>
>You got them *all* maxed? Impressive! I've only mastered all the research
>languages including such things as elder dragon and erudian. But I'm in no
>way inclined to go through the trouble of getting some of the evil race
>languages up like Orcs and Gnoll languages. :P

Actually I got to excelent in all the languages a while back, it wasn't
being bored. It was in the hopes that verant would put in quest that
required you to speak to the NPC is a specific language to be able to
converse with them. Wishful thinking on my part. But it would give those
languages a use. :)
Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
